H0.text: what type of planet is neptune known as. Ice Planet

H1.text: what type of planet is neptune known as. Gas Planet

H2.text: what type of planet is neptune known as. Blue Planet

H3.text: what type of planet is neptune known as. giant

A4.text: Neptune is the densest giant planet.

A5.text: Traces of methane in Neptune's outermost regions make it appear faintly blue.

A6.text: Uranus and Neptune are now referred to as ice giants.

A7.text: Neptune and Uranus consist of only about 20% hydrogen and helium by mass, compared to the Solar System's gas giants, Jupiter and Saturn, which are more than 90% hydrogen and helium by mass.

A8.text: Neptune, a planet in the Solar System that appears blue and can therefore be called 'Blue planet'
